title: Dining Out During FODMAP Testing
summary: Practical tips for maintaining your protocol when eating at restaurants with friends and family.
content:
# Dining Out During FODMAP Testing

## Planning Ahead

Call the restaurant in advance and ask about ingredient lists. Many restaurants are happy to accommodate dietary needs when given notice.

## Communication Strategies

Be clear and confident when explaining your dietary needs. You don't need to go into medical details - simply state what you can and cannot eat.

## Safe Menu Choices

Look for grilled proteins, steamed vegetables, and rice-based dishes. These are typically safe options that can be modified to fit your needs.

## Bringing Your Own

Don't hesitate to bring your own low-FODMAP condiments or sides if needed. Most restaurants understand and appreciate guests who take their health seriously.
author: FODMAP Nutrition Team
